title: PAC-Dev
author: PAC-Dev
content: Good day everyone! I hope you are doing well...Today I want to tell you about our project, which will surely interest you.What is the project about?‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†íPACMan ($PAC) - the first non-native coin on the OctaSpace network, whose can use in different ways. First of all, it is the Play-2-Earn system. We offer games ( computer and mobile). The ecosystem combines NFT trading with virtual heroes¬† where users acquire tokens, monitor their development, and participate in battles with other players.¬† The project‚Äôs developers pursue the goal to combine concepts such as the metaverse, play-to-earn (P2E) system, and NFTs.Each¬† hero of the metaverse is a unique token that can be¬† pump/ sold / bought / exchanged and so on. Secondly, we offer to use our service, which for convenience collects and combines the most popular neural networks for generating and processing images, videos, voices and texts, such as Midjourney, Stable Diffusion, Kandinsky, ChatGPT and many others.At the moment, the service is free, for the period of product testing, in the future it will be distributed according to a monthly subscription system, which can be paid for with $PAC tokens.¬†Thirdly, PACMan project allow staking use a ‚Äúconsensus mechanism‚Äù called Proof of Stake,¬†which is the way to ensure that all transactions are verified and secured without a bank or payment processor in the middle. Using these technologies¬† pac‚Äôs owners can get some profit.What makes your project unique?‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†íOur project represents the first non-native coin of the OctaSpace Network.We have implemented a mining reward system that is different from the rest. A reward in the form of $PAC tokens can be obtained by mining the main coin of the network - $OCTA.We develop games for mobile devices and integrate blockchain technologies into them, which allows you to synchronize your MetaMask wallet and game account.Also, we give players the opportunity to get additional $PAC tokens just by playing our games and completing various tasks.To do this, the player needs to have at least 1 NFT on their account, each of which has its own distinctive characteristics and skills.And most importantly, we are actively working to implement $PAC tokens in everyday life!History of your project.‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†íThe official launch date for the project is April 8th. Already on May 1, we released the $PAC token to a large audience.In such a short time of the existence of the project, we managed to do quite a lot of serious work.‚Ä¢ Launch a test augmented reality service using our NFTs.‚Ä¢ Launch staking pools of $OCTA and $PAC coins in various formats.‚Ä¢ Launch the official mining pool $OCTA + $PAC‚Ä¢ Enter a large market by opening trading on two exchanges.‚Ä¢ Release our basic version of NFT for sale‚Ä¢ Alpha Release AR service‚Ä¢ Finished work on a unique NFT collection consisting of 10 different characters from movies and cartoons.‚Ä¢ Finished work on a mobile game using blockchain technologies, NFT and token integration into the game.‚Ä¢ Bridge $PAC (Octa.Space Network)¬† -> $PAC (Binance Smart Chain). It will allow us to reach a large audience and scale our services, including in terms of creating/selling NFT collections that are necessary to receive rewards in our games.‚Ä¢ AI Telegram BotWhat‚Äôs next for your project?‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†íWe don't plan to stop there, we still have a lot of plans that we simply must implement. Among them are:‚Ä¢ Interactive bulletin board‚Ä¢ Mobile online game. With a combat system, large locations, interesting mechanics. NFTs and $PAC tokens will also be introduced.‚Ä¢ Several secret mobile projects.‚Ä¢ System of rates and ratings with payments of $PAC tokens‚Ä¢ Release of a full-fledged AA project for PC using blockchain technology, NFT, in-game purchases and the possibility of receiving $PAC coins‚Ä¢ And of course - improving existing services!What can your token be used for?‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†íCurrently the $PAC token can be used for:‚Ä¢ Trading on DEX and CEX platforms.‚Ä¢ Purchases of NFTs from our collections for various purposes (use in AR application, mobile game)‚Ä¢ $PAC coin staking (also we can get extra coins for staking $OCTA coin)‚Ä¢ Mining. We can mine additional $PAC coins while mining the $OCTA coin.‚Ä¢ Play-2-Earn. You can use project tokens for in-game purchases, receiving coins for completed tasks. In the future, methods of use will be expanded, with various updates.üìå¬† OFFICIAL RESOURCES‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://pacman.pw/ - Official website ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://pacman.pw/wp/ - Whitepaper ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://bridgepacman.pw/ - Bridge | OctaSpace ‚áî¬† BSC ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://t.me/AIFastBrain_bot?start=340292140 - AI Bot in Telegramüìå¬† INSTRUCTIONS‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://medium.com/@pacman-token/how-to-use-the-pac-bridge-octaspace-bsc-2d3b0da5bedd - How to use the $PAC Bridge (OctaSpace ‚áî BSC) ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://medium.com/@pacman-token/how-to-add-pac-coins-to-the-pancakeswap-liquidity-pool-e299dae3451d - How to add $PAC coins to the PancakeSwap liquidity poolüìå¬† ¬† GAMES‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://pacmanwars.pw/ - Pacman Wars üìå¬† ¬† STAKING‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://coinstaking.space/ - $OCTA | 1000 coins ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://octastaking.space/ - $OCTA | 200 coins ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://stakingpacman.pw/ - $PAC | 10000 coins ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://solopacman.pw/ - $PAC | 50000 coins üìå¬† ¬† MINING POOLS‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://gteh.org/ - PPLNS Mining [OCTA + PAC + ZIL]‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://miningpacman.pw/ - SOLO Mining [OCTA + PAC]+ 1 more soon...üìå¬† ¬† SOCIALS‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://discord.gg/JFwaENGDxy - Discord server ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://twitter.com/PACMan_Token - Twitter ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://t.me/PacmanCoinMain - EN Telegram ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://t.me/PacmanCoinRU - RU Telegram üìå¬† ¬† EXCHANGES‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://txbit.io/Trade/PAC/USDT - PAC/USDT | Txbit ‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://xeggex.com/market/PAC_USDT - PAC/USDT | XeggeX‚û•Ô∏ôhttps://pancakeswap.finance/swap?inputCurrency=0xD722baC68242bc0b830667cD8999AE6DcDFAAC69&outputCurrency=0x55d398326f99059fF775485246999027B3197955 - PAC/USDT | PancakeSwap

comments.author: PAC-Dev
comments.body: ‚ÑπÔ∏è¬† How to add $PAC token¬† in the MetaMask walletThere are a few simple steps to add $PAC token to your MetaMask Wallet.‚û°Ô∏è¬† OctaSpace Network‚û•Ô∏ôOpen the MetaMask extension‚û•Ô∏ôSwitch to the Octa.Space Network‚û•Ô∏ôClick "Import tokens"‚û•Ô∏ôIn the contract address field, enter: "0x760eE1038b54D5AdfeBbC9560Dd13F46a92D5b3a"‚û•Ô∏ôClick "Import"‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚û°Ô∏è¬† Binance Smart Chain (BSC)‚û•Ô∏ôOpen the MetaMask extension‚û•Ô∏ôSwitch to the Binance Smart Chain (BSC)‚û•Ô∏ôClick "Import tokens"‚û•Ô∏ôIn the contract address field, enter: "0xD722baC68242bc0b830667cD8999AE6DcDFAAC69"‚û•Ô∏ôClick "Import"‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†íüîó¬† Add Octa.Space Network from ChainList - https://chainlist.org/chain/800001üîó¬† Add Binance Smart Chain from ChainList - https://chainlist.org/chain/56

comments.author: PAC-Dev
comments.body: Quote from: daledale on August 01, 2023, 08:49:55 PMDo not count for advertising, I have been in the project for several months. I mean staking. As an indirect confirmation that this is not a fake post, you can look at the date of registration of my account. In general, I recommend the community to take a closer look at the project and I'm sure you won't regret it. One of the main points that I singled out for myself is that the team is always in touch, responds quite quickly to any questions in the telegram channel. ps Perhaps there are nuances of translation, I translate with Google translator.It's nice to see people here who are already involved in the project.

comments.body: Community poll here!Take part in two votings in our Discord "Vote" channel, everyone's opinion is important to us!https://discord.com/channels/1107269477751599146/1135481937448943648

comments.body: üë®‚Äçüíª Hello there! üëç We would like to break silence and show you a short video about our NFT platform in action. WIP (work in progress), as it‚Äôs called. You can read the tweet in our official twitter account - https://twitter.com/PACMan_Token/status/1687511460438573056Or in our Discord channel - https://discord.com/channels/1107269477751599146/1107272411008741437/1137070678890254416

comments.author: PAC-Dev
comments.body: Hello everyone!We are glad to inform you about the start of a new creative contest in our discord!Show off your creative skills and win a #PAC-branded mouse and mousepad set!All the details in our discord server: https://discord.com/channels/1107269477751599146/1109579914044256347/1138920483891458078

comments.author: PAC-Dev
comments.body: üí£¬† Meet - Pacman Wars! We are pleased to inform you that all phases of testing have been completed, and now the game is also available on Android mobile devices.In this game, you have to take on the role of a squad leader and lead him into battle to defeat the enemy!To cope with the task, you have to increase the number of your troops, their strength and endurance, as well as show personal activity on the battlefield!The game contains elements such as:‚û•Ô∏ôCharacter leveling‚û•Ô∏ôSquad leveling‚û•Ô∏ôLeveling military equipment‚û•Ô∏ôDifferent Locationsüí™¬† And the main feature of our game is the integration of $PAC tokens into the project economy.If you own at least the basic version of PACMan NFT, you can earn project tokens for completing the game and levels.If you feel that you are not strong enough, using $PAC tokens, you can speed up your leveling, which will lead you to victory and a well-deserved reward at the end of the path.üéÆ¬† The game is available on PC and Android devices (older than version 10)P.S. Later the game will appear in Google Play, but we want to give you the opportunity to play and earn now‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†íDiscord full post:https://discord.com/channels/1107269477751599146/1109579914044256347/1141095647525752933Pacman Wars - Download .apkhttps://drive.google.com/file/d/1hYX3yJeADYd6r9SnDGEBxqBRSIvFv44l/view

comments.author: PAC-Dev
comments.body: üëÄ We are present to your attention the second game, which is now in active development - PAC&Ball.üòÆ We have already shown you a short gameplay video, but now you can try out the simple mechanics of the game yourself and practice before the release of the multiplayer version, against other players, and so same betting systems.ü§î The aim of the game is to be the first to reach the finish line. The task seems easy at first glance, but throughout the game you will be hindered by other players (or bots), knocking you down or using various traps against you.üéÆ¬† The game is available Android devices (older than version 10)‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†í‚†íDiscord full post:https://discord.com/channels/1107269477751599146/1109579914044256347/1141296830211178587PAC&Ball - Gameplay video:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zc8FvEA-5NoPAC&Ball - Download .apk:https://drive.google.com/file/d/13Ury5lkAzhRyRkFcx1eoiut7EQnatfoJ/view?usp=sharing
